title: Combination of uses as mentioned below may be permissible with the permission of the Authority even if the reservation is for a specific purpose
clause_text: Combination of uses as mentioned below may be permissible with the permission of the Authority even if the reservation is for a specific purpose.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
